step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders stable. Focus on opening your fingers wider in the next repetition.
Your shoulder blades are squeezing together well. Try to extend your arms further overhead and straighten your elbows more.
You're making a good fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Ensure you're inhaling fully as you tighten your muscles.
You're extending your arms overhead and exhaling. Try to relax your shoulders more as you stretch back.
Good job relaxing and stretching your arms overhead. Keep your fingers open and relaxed.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms overhead with open fingers and then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale as you relax and stretch back.
